name: Assets
description: Retrieve Assets Data from Asset Packs.

static_functions.name: GetAssetPacks
static_functions.description: Gets a list containing information about all loaded Asset Packs

static_functions.name: GetAssetPath
static_functions.description: Gets the file path of an asset

parameters.name: asset
parameters.description: The asset reference in the format asset-pack::AssetKey

return.description: The file path defined in the Assets.toml

static_functions.name: GetAnimations
static_functions.description: Gets a list containing all Animation Assets Keys from an AssetPack

return.description: array of tables containing all assets and it's metadata

parameters.name: asset_pack_path
parameters.description: The Asset Pack path to get the assets

return.description: array of tables containing all assets and it's metadata

parameters.name: asset_pack_path
parameters.description: The Asset Pack path to get the assets

static_functions.name: Precache
static_functions.description: Manually adds an Asset to be loaded during the Player's loading screen
